title: IAngleMateFeatureData.EntitiesToMate
description: Gets or sets the entities to mate in this angle mate.
returns: Array of entities to mate (see Remarks )
remarks:
You can create angle mates with the following mate entity combinations:
Mate entity/Mate entity
IRefAxis
(cone, cylinder)
IFace2
(extrusion face,
draft is not allowed)
IEdge
,
IRefAxis,
ICenterLine
,
ISketchLine
(line)
IRefPlane
IRefAxis (cone, cylinder)
